personal.name: Kim Chansokpheng
personal.title: Cybersecurity - Web Penetration Tester | Full-Stack Web Developer | IT Instructor
personal.quote: Learning from others is my strength :)

about.purpose: I am a dedicated individual with a profound passion for computer technology, innovation, arts, and business. My future goal is to build up the strong backgrounds, skills, work experiences, communication, a strong Cybersecurity community in Cambodia and wanted to bring all of these to global to show up both communities and country reputation.
about.description: Passionate Cybersecurity Expert and Full-Stack Developer with 3+ years of experience in web development, penetration testing, and IT instruction. Specialized in web security, with hands-on experience in bug bounty programs and CTF competitions. Currently serving as an IT Instructor at the Center of Science and Technology Advanced Development, mentoring the next generation of cybersecurity professionals. You can find me on Github or LinkedIn

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.description: I'm always interested in discussing new opportunities in cybersecurity, web development, or IT education. Whether you're looking for a security consultant, full-stack developer, or IT instructor, feel free to reach out via email.
